title: Amaziah’s Pride and Defeat
summary: Amaziah becomes king of Judah and initially follows God. He defeats Edom but grows proud and challenges Israel’s king, Jehoash, who defeats him and plunders Jerusalem. Meanwhile, Jeroboam II rules in Israel and expands its borders despite continued idolatry.

faq.question: What led to Amaziah’s downfall?
faq.answer: His pride after victory over Edom caused him to challenge Israel unnecessarily.

faq.question: How did God show mercy to Israel?
faq.answer: Through Jeroboam II, who restored lost territories despite the nation’s sin.
